pageContext.claim: “Because the heads of the union are not honest people. They're not honest, and they ought to lower your dues, by the way. They ought to stop with the dues. They -- you're paying too much dues. As an example, they could've kept General Motors. They could've kept it in that gorgeous plant at Lordstown. They could've kept it. Lower your dues. Lower your dues.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is blaming auto worker union officials and union membership dues for the closure of GM's plant in Lordstown, Ohio. But union officials cut their own costs and agreed to more than $100 million in concessions to GM.
